meanings.sent1: She presignaled her arrival by sending a text message before reaching the party.
meanings.sent2: The traffic light presignaled the upcoming stop with a yellow warning.
meanings.sent3: The cat presignaled its desire for food by meowing loudly near the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds presignaled the approaching storm with thunder rumbling in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The teacher presignaled the end of the class by packing up her books and turning off the lights.

meanings.sent1: The presignaled alarm system alerted the residents before the fire spread.
meanings.sent2: The presignaled train departure time allowed passengers to board without rushing.
meanings.sent3: The presignaled surprise party was almost ruined when the birthday girl accidentally found out.
meanings.sent4: The presignaled warning signs along the road prevented accidents during the foggy weather.
meanings.sent5: The presignaled announcement of the new policy change caused mixed reactions among the employees.
